sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"使人高兴的，令人发笑的"之意。
means: humorous ： 指富有幽默感、诙谐、引人发笑的。
funny ： 非正式用词，通常侧重因古怪、奇特或不合适宜的举动等引起的发笑。
comic ： 指像喜剧一样滑稽可笑。
witty ： 强调机智而饶有风趣。

sentence.Network_en: John Lennon found time to publish two books of his humorous prose.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰·列侬抽时间出版了两本幽默散文。

sentence.Network_en: Normally he asked questions, and had a humorous remark or two.
sentence.Network_cn: 通常都是他提问题，还不时地冒出一两句俏皮话。

sentence.Network_en: The writing is brutally tough and savagely humorous.
sentence.Network_cn: 该作品带有残酷的强悍和野性的幽默感。

人教版高中英语单词表(第三册上必修) - 豆丁网 ... humour n. 幽默，幽默感 humorous a. 富于幽默的 advantage n. 优点；好处.
形容人性格的词汇 ... gentle 有礼貌的 humorous 有幽默； impartial 公正的.

list.abs: 房水（aqueous humor）为充盈于眼房中的无色透明流动液体。眼房分前房与后房。
2003年3月13日 - 由于眼睛中的排水系统构造遭到破坏,无法正常的把水样液(aqueous humor)液体排出眼球外,因此会造成眼压上升。虽然PCG的发生机率大概只有万分之一,但是一旦.
黑色幽默（black humor）（Black Humor）黑色幽默（black humor）不同于一般幽默的地方在于，它的荒诞不经、冷嘲热讽、玩世不恭之中包含了沉重和苦闷、眼泪和 …
whodunit 推理小说humorous story 幽默小说historical novel 历史小说

encyclopedia.content: 英语单词humorous读音 美式：['hjumərəs] 英式：['hju:mərəs] 21世纪大英汉词典释义 形容词 adj. full of or characterized by humor humorous（1） ① 幽默的，滑稽的 ② 诙谐的，有幽默感的 ③ 性情乖戾的，古怪的（古语） 同近义词：witty（强调机智而饶有风趣） funny（非正式用词，通常侧重因古怪、奇特或不合适宜的举动等引起的发笑） 反义词：humorless humourless unhumorous humoro

entry.tran: 滑稽的;（尤指）幽默的,诙谐的
entry.def: If someone or something is humorous, they are amusing, especially in a clever or witty way.

example.ex: He was quite humorous, and I liked that about him.
example.tran: 他很幽默，我喜欢他这一点。

means.word_mean: 1. full of or characterized by humor;

auth_sentence.content: Still, humorous pitches don't work on everyone.
auth_sentence.res_content: Still, humorous pitches don't work on everyone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Still, humorous pitches don't work on everyone.

auth_sentence.content: Lachlan and James Murdoch gave humorous, off-color speeches.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lachlan and James Murdoch gave humorous, off-color speeches.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lachlan and James Murdoch gave humorous, off-color speeches.

auth_sentence.content: His portraits of local characters are richly humorous and vivid.
auth_sentence.res_content: His portraits of local characters are richly humorous and vivid.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His portraits of local characters are richly humorous and vivid.

Sentence.sentence: Substitutions of one gesture for the other often create not only humorous but also embarrassing moment.
But of course there is also a kind of humorous satisfaction in seeing somebody self-important making a fool of themselves.
We derive some humorous satisfaction from their misfortune

jushi.english: He is a very kindly and rather humorous man.
jushi.chinese: 他是一个十分善良和充满幽默感的人。
